summary.problem: User needs access to a combined feed grain trade flow dataset for China including commodities such as grain sorghum, oats, maize, rye, barley, and DDGs.
summary.solution: The China feed grains TradeMatrix is available on the platform. Users can access it by using the TradeMatrix code "zimb-77299e24-d469-47fd-b7fb-f7f2d4abaa9a" or by navigating to the TradeMatrix Module on the platform and selecting the TradeMatrix named "China Feed Grain". The direct URL to access it is https://zimb.dnext.io/fundamentals/tradematrix/zimb-77299e24-d469-47fd-b7fb-f7f2d4abaa9a.
